name: S-HOLLOW
description:
FREE GAME made exclusively for YAZJAM 2020.

*** THE GAME MIGHT TRIGGER WINDOWS DEFENDER AND ANTI-VIRUSES, THE GAME IS JUST NOT CERTIFIED, YOU CAN PLAY SAFELY. ***

Description
--------------
Play the shape, be the shape, kill the shapes. Stay on your toes, there will be so much going on! Quick paste action bullet hell game here. 
Playtime = 5 to 30 minutes.

Controls
----------
[YOU ABSOLUTELY NEED A "QWERTY" KEYBOARD SCHEME]
WASD = Move
Left Click = Shoot
Right Click = Bullet

Troubleshooting
----------
• If the game don't save your progress, be sure that the game is not in the "C:\Program Files" folders.
• If you're playing on a laptop and the background is not working, You might need to try a desktop computer.
